## Welcome! ðŸ¦Š

Welcome to the **Quarto Purple Fox** template! This format extension provides enhanced callout styling with rounded corners, colored borders, and shadow effects.

## Quick Start Guide

### Installation

If you haven't already installed this extension, run:

```bash
quarto add yahaiz/quarto-purple-fox
```

### Basic Usage

Simply add the format to your document's YAML header:

```yaml
---
title: "My Document"
format:
  quarto-purple-fox-html: default
---
```
